title: Tech giants from Google to TikTok face tougher E.U. rules
description: BRUSSELS — Tech giants including Facebook, Google, Twitter and TikTok face stricter online content rules in the European Union due to their huge number of users.

title: Is Bing too belligerent? Microsoft looks to tame AI chatbot
description: Microsoft’s newly revamped Bing search engine can write recipes and songs and quickly explain just about anything it can find on the internet.

title: In private, Fox News stars, staff blasted election fraud claims as bogus, court filing shows
description: Employees at Fox News knew that claims blaming election fraud for Donald Trump’s 2020 loss were outlandish and false, even as the network continued to promote them as credible, a newly unsealed court filing appears to show.
